Orie has a crush on Sensei Yuka, but he never addresses his feelings to her. He feels that everyone needs to respect him because he was taking his class longer than others like Abe-kun. Abe-kun is a real man who talks to everyone equally and acts like a decent human being. However, Orie's main problem is that he thinks he could get into Yuka's pants by doing chores. Her husband died the previous year and Orie wants to taken advantage of her emotions. He gets violent and attacks Abe-kun because only he can heal her heart. The two of them may had a rough start but now they are deeply in love.  His large member causes Yuka to have intense orgasms that make her forget the pain of losing her husband. She tries to pity Orie, but he is not a real man. A real man makes his feelings known to the woman he cares about and together they become one. Yuka tells him that he will never have her nor be a match for Abe-kun . Abe-kun is a stronger, and better man with a large cock that makes her cum.
